headline: Not good
pros: Fast paced and full lunch break

headline: Great people and learning experience
pros: Small team at the time, able to make a difference without all the redtape
cons: mismanaged and unorganized, dated software over time, lack of talented resources that knew the code base

headline: Account management
pros: Good people able to make decision's on your own without micromanaging
cons: Poor upper managment and organization. Subpar product compared to other platforms
